00036 struct RRemoteSubscription: public RDK2::Object {
00037 
00038     enum What {
00039         WHAT_UNKNOWN = 0,
00040         WHAT_ANY = WHAT_UNKNOWN,
00041         STORAGE_VALUE = 1,
00042         STORAGE_DIFFS = 2,
00043         QUEUE = 3

00045

00047         WHEN_UNKNOWN = 0,
00048         WHEN_ANY = WHEN_UNKNOWN,
00049         ON_CHANGE = 1,
00050         PERIODIC = 2
00051     } when;
00052

00057
